content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Getting To Giwa Gardens Water Park” font_container=”tag:h1|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]

We are only nine minutes away from Novare mall, the largest in West Africa

[/vc_column_text][vc_gmaps link=”#E-8_”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Our Address” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]

Giwa Gardens Water Park, Ejike street, native villa, Off ablag road, monastery way, Sangotedo, Lagos

[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”Get Directions” style=”flat” shape=”round” color=”blue” align=”center” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.google.com%2Fmaps%2Fdir%2F%2FEjike%2BSt%2C%2BEti-Osa%2B106104%2C%2BLekki%2C%2BLagos%2C%2BNigeria%2F%406.4590721%2C3.6241465%2C17z%2Fdata%3D!4m8!4m7!1m0!1m5!1m1!1s0x103bf974b5cea19f%3A0x73f44605fbff683b!2m2!1d3.6267214!2d6.4590721|target:_blank”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
